trans-unit.source: Controls how a document is printed, when printing from a Windows Forms application.
trans-unit.target: 문서 인쇄 방법을 Windows Forms 응용 프로그램에서 인쇄할 때 제어 합니다.

trans-unit.source: When implemented in a derived class, PrintController controls how a <xref:System.Drawing.Printing.PrintDocument> is printed.
trans-unit.target: 에서 구현 된 경우 파생된 클래스에서 PrintController 컨트롤 어떻게는 <xref:System.Drawing.Printing.PrintDocument>인쇄 됩니다.</xref:System.Drawing.Printing.PrintDocument>

trans-unit.source: <xref:System.Drawing.Printing.PrintDocument.Print%2A?displayProperty=fullName> invokes the print controller's <xref:System.Drawing.Printing.PrintController.OnStartPrint%2A>, <xref:System.Drawing.Printing.PrintController.OnEndPrint%2A>, <xref:System.Drawing.Printing.PrintController.OnStartPage%2A>, and <xref:System.Drawing.Printing.PrintController.OnEndPage%2A> methods, which in turn tell the printer how to print the document.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Drawing.Printing.PrintDocument.Print%2A?displayProperty=fullName>인쇄 컨트롤러를 호출 <xref:System.Drawing.Printing.PrintController.OnStartPrint%2A>, <xref:System.Drawing.Printing.PrintController.OnEndPrint%2A>, <xref:System.Drawing.Printing.PrintController.OnStartPage%2A>, 및 <xref:System.Drawing.Printing.PrintController.OnEndPage%2A>메서드는 문서를 인쇄 하는 방법을 프린터에 알려 줍니다.</xref:System.Drawing.Printing.PrintController.OnEndPage%2A> </xref:System.Drawing.Printing.PrintController.OnStartPage%2A> </xref:System.Drawing.Printing.PrintController.OnEndPrint%2A> </xref:System.Drawing.Printing.PrintController.OnStartPrint%2A></xref:System.Drawing.Printing.PrintDocument.Print%2A?displayProperty=fullName>

trans-unit.source: Print preview uses a specialized PrintController.
trans-unit.target: 인쇄 미리 보기에는 특수 한 PrintController 사용 합니다.

trans-unit.source: For an example of a print controller that is specialized for print preview, see the <xref:System.Drawing.Printing.PreviewPrintController>.
trans-unit.target: 인쇄 미리 보기에 지정 된 인쇄 컨트롤러의 예를 들어 <xref:System.Drawing.Printing.PreviewPrintController>.</xref:System.Drawing.Printing.PreviewPrintController> 을 참조 하십시오.

trans-unit.source: PrintController is used by <xref:System.Drawing.Printing.PrintDocument>, and not typically used directly.
trans-unit.target: PrintController에서 사용 하는 <xref:System.Drawing.Printing.PrintDocument>, 직접 사용할 일반적으로 사용 되지 않습니다.</xref:System.Drawing.Printing.PrintDocument>

trans-unit.source: The .NET Framework includes three print controllers that are derived from PrintController that help accomplish common tasks.
trans-unit.target: .NET Framework는 세 명의 인쇄 컨트롤러 PrintController에서 파생 된 일반적인 작업을 수행 하는 데 도움이 되는 포함 되어 있습니다.

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Drawing.Printing.StandardPrintController> prints a document to a printer.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Drawing.Printing.StandardPrintController>프린터에 문서를 인쇄 합니다.</xref:System.Drawing.Printing.StandardPrintController>

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Drawing.Printing.PreviewPrintController> generates a preview of what the document will look like when printed and is used by the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.PrintPreviewControl> and <xref:System.Windows.Forms.PrintPreviewDialog> classes.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Drawing.Printing.PreviewPrintController>문서의 모양을 인쇄 및에서 사용 하는 경우의 미리 보기 생성의 <xref:System.Windows.Forms.PrintPreviewControl>및 <xref:System.Windows.Forms.PrintPreviewDialog>클래스.</xref:System.Windows.Forms.PrintPreviewDialog> </xref:System.Windows.Forms.PrintPreviewControl> </xref:System.Drawing.Printing.PreviewPrintController>

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Windows.Forms.PrintControllerWithStatusDialog> provides a printing status dialog during the printing process.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Windows.Forms.PrintControllerWithStatusDialog>인쇄 중 인쇄 상태 대화 상자를 제공 합니다.</xref:System.Windows.Forms.PrintControllerWithStatusDialog>

trans-unit.source: For more information about printing with Windows Forms, see the <xref:System.Drawing.Printing> namespace overview.
trans-unit.target: Windows forms 인쇄에 대 한 자세한 내용은 참조는 <xref:System.Drawing.Printing>네임 스페이스 개요.</xref:System.Drawing.Printing>

trans-unit.source: If you wish to print from a Windows Presentation Foundation application, see the <xref:System.Printing> namespace.
trans-unit.target: Windows Presentation Foundation 응용 프로그램에서 인쇄 하려는 경우 참조는 <xref:System.Printing>네임 스페이스.</xref:System.Printing>

trans-unit.source: Initializes a new instance of the <xref href="System.Drawing.Printing.PrintController"></xref> class.
trans-unit.target: 새 인스턴스를 초기화는 <xref href="System.Drawing.Printing.PrintController"> </xref> 클래스입니다.

trans-unit.source: Gets a value indicating whether the <xref href="System.Drawing.Printing.PrintController"></xref> is used for print preview.
trans-unit.target: 나타내는 값을 가져옵니다 여부는 <xref href="System.Drawing.Printing.PrintController"> </xref> 인쇄 미리 보기에 사용 됩니다.

trans-unit.source: <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""></xref> in all cases.
trans-unit.target: <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""></xref>모든 경우

trans-unit.source: When overridden in a derived class, completes the control sequence that determines when and how to print a page of a document.
trans-unit.target: 파생된 클래스에서 재정의 되 면 시기 및 문서의 페이지를 인쇄 하는 방법을 결정 하는 컨트롤 시퀀스를 완료 합니다.

trans-unit.source: OnEndPage is called immediately after the <xref:System.Drawing.Printing.PrintDocument> raises the <xref:System.Drawing.Printing.PrintDocument.PrintPage> event.
trans-unit.target: OnEndPage 직후에 호출 되는 <xref:System.Drawing.Printing.PrintDocument>발생는 <xref:System.Drawing.Printing.PrintDocument.PrintPage>이벤트.</xref:System.Drawing.Printing.PrintDocument.PrintPage> </xref:System.Drawing.Printing.PrintDocument>

trans-unit.source: If an exception is thrown inside a <xref:System.Drawing.Printing.PrintDocument.PrintPage> event of a <xref:System.Drawing.Printing.PrintDocument>, OnEndPage is not called.
trans-unit.target: 내에서 예외가 throw 되는 경우는 <xref:System.Drawing.Printing.PrintDocument.PrintPage>의 이벤트는 <xref:System.Drawing.Printing.PrintDocument>, OnEndPage가 호출 되지 않습니다.</xref:System.Drawing.Printing.PrintDocument> </xref:System.Drawing.Printing.PrintDocument.PrintPage>

trans-unit.source: <xref:System.Drawing.Printing.PrintController.OnStartPrint%2A> creates the <xref:System.Drawing.Graphics> that is sent to the printer.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Drawing.Printing.PrintController.OnStartPrint%2A>만듭니다는 <xref:System.Drawing.Graphics>프린터에 보내집니다.</xref:System.Drawing.Graphics></xref:System.Drawing.Printing.PrintController.OnStartPrint%2A>

trans-unit.source: After <xref:System.Drawing.Printing.PrintController.OnStartPrint%2A> is called, the <xref:System.Drawing.Printing.PrintController.OnStartPage%2A> method sets the <xref:System.Drawing.Graphics> to a graphic of a single page.
trans-unit.target: 후 <xref:System.Drawing.Printing.PrintController.OnStartPrint%2A>호출 되는 <xref:System.Drawing.Printing.PrintController.OnStartPage%2A>메서드 집합은 <xref:System.Drawing.Graphics>단일 페이지의 그래픽으로.</xref:System.Drawing.Graphics> </xref:System.Drawing.Printing.PrintController.OnStartPage%2A> </xref:System.Drawing.Printing.PrintController.OnStartPrint%2A>

trans-unit.source: (Use the <xref:System.Drawing.Printing.PrintController.OnStartPage%2A> method to set how to print a page in a document.
trans-unit.target: (사용 된 <xref:System.Drawing.Printing.PrintController.OnStartPage%2A>문서에서 페이지를 인쇄 하는 방법을 설정 하는 방법은.</xref:System.Drawing.Printing.PrintController.OnStartPage%2A>

trans-unit.source: For example, you can adjust page settings separately for each page.) The OnEndPage method clears the <xref:System.Drawing.Graphics>, while the <xref:System.Drawing.Printing.PrintController.OnEndPrint%2A> method deallocates the object.
trans-unit.target: 예를 들어 각 페이지 별로 페이지 설정을 조정할 수 있습니다.) OnEndPage 메서드는 <xref:System.Drawing.Graphics>, 동안는 <xref:System.Drawing.Printing.PrintController.OnEndPrint%2A>메서드 개체 할당을 취소 합니다.</xref:System.Drawing.Printing.PrintController.OnEndPrint%2A> </xref:System.Drawing.Graphics>

trans-unit.source: A <xref href="System.Drawing.Printing.PrintDocument"></xref> that represents the document currently being printed.
trans-unit.target: A <xref href="System.Drawing.Printing.PrintDocument"> </xref> 현재 인쇄 중인 문서를 나타내는입니다.

trans-unit.source: A <xref href="System.Drawing.Printing.PrintPageEventArgs"></xref> that contains the event data.
trans-unit.target: A <xref href="System.Drawing.Printing.PrintPageEventArgs"> </xref> 하는 이벤트 데이터를 포함 합니다.

trans-unit.source: When overridden in a derived class, completes the control sequence that determines when and how to print a document.
trans-unit.target: 파생된 클래스에서 재정의 되 면 시기 및 문서를 인쇄 하는 방법을 결정 하는 컨트롤 시퀀스를 완료 합니다.

trans-unit.source: OnEndPrint is called immediately after the <xref:System.Drawing.Printing.PrintDocument> raises the <xref:System.Drawing.Printing.PrintDocument.EndPrint> event.
trans-unit.target: OnEndPrint 직후에 호출 되는 <xref:System.Drawing.Printing.PrintDocument>발생는 <xref:System.Drawing.Printing.PrintDocument.EndPrint>이벤트.</xref:System.Drawing.Printing.PrintDocument.EndPrint> </xref:System.Drawing.Printing.PrintDocument>

trans-unit.source: <xref:System.Drawing.Printing.PrintController.OnStartPrint%2A> creates the <xref:System.Drawing.Graphics> that is sent to the printer.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Drawing.Printing.PrintController.OnStartPrint%2A>만듭니다는 <xref:System.Drawing.Graphics>프린터에 보내집니다.</xref:System.Drawing.Graphics></xref:System.Drawing.Printing.PrintController.OnStartPrint%2A>

trans-unit.source: After <xref:System.Drawing.Printing.PrintController.OnStartPrint%2A> is called, the <xref:System.Drawing.Printing.PrintController.OnStartPage%2A> method sets the <xref:System.Drawing.Graphics> to a graphic of a single page.
trans-unit.target: 후 <xref:System.Drawing.Printing.PrintController.OnStartPrint%2A>호출 되는 <xref:System.Drawing.Printing.PrintController.OnStartPage%2A>메서드 집합은 <xref:System.Drawing.Graphics>단일 페이지의 그래픽으로.</xref:System.Drawing.Graphics> </xref:System.Drawing.Printing.PrintController.OnStartPage%2A> </xref:System.Drawing.Printing.PrintController.OnStartPrint%2A>

trans-unit.source: (Use the <xref:System.Drawing.Printing.PrintController.OnStartPrint%2A> method to determine when and how to print a document.
trans-unit.target: (사용 된 <xref:System.Drawing.Printing.PrintController.OnStartPrint%2A>시기 및 문서를 인쇄 하는 방법을 결정 하는 메서드.</xref:System.Drawing.Printing.PrintController.OnStartPrint%2A>

trans-unit.source: For example, you can delay printing for 30 minutes or adjust the printer settings for the document.) The <xref:System.Drawing.Printing.PrintController.OnEndPage%2A> method clears the <xref:System.Drawing.Graphics>, while the OnEndPrint method deallocates the object.
trans-unit.target: 예를 들어 있습니다 수 지연 30 분에 대 한 인쇄 하거나 문서에 대 한 프린터 설정을 조정 합니다.) <xref:System.Drawing.Printing.PrintController.OnEndPage%2A>메서드 지웁니다는 <xref:System.Drawing.Graphics>OnEndPrint 메서드는 개체의 할당을 취소 하는 반면,.</xref:System.Drawing.Graphics> </xref:System.Drawing.Printing.PrintController.OnEndPage%2A>

trans-unit.source: A <xref href="System.Drawing.Printing.PrintDocument"></xref> that represents the document currently being printed.
trans-unit.target: A <xref href="System.Drawing.Printing.PrintDocument"> </xref> 현재 인쇄 중인 문서를 나타내는입니다.

trans-unit.source: A <xref href="System.Drawing.Printing.PrintEventArgs"></xref> that contains the event data.
trans-unit.target: A <xref href="System.Drawing.Printing.PrintEventArgs"> </xref> 하는 이벤트 데이터를 포함 합니다.

trans-unit.source: When overridden in a derived class, begins the control sequence that determines when and how to print a page of a document.
trans-unit.target: 파생된 클래스에서 재정의 되 면 시기 및 문서의 페이지를 인쇄 하는 방법을 결정 하는 컨트롤 시퀀스를 시작 합니다.

trans-unit.source: OnStartPage is called immediately before the <xref:System.Drawing.Printing.PrintDocument> raises the <xref:System.Drawing.Printing.PrintDocument.PrintPage> event.
trans-unit.target: OnStartPage 바로 전에 호출 됩니다는 <xref:System.Drawing.Printing.PrintDocument>발생는 <xref:System.Drawing.Printing.PrintDocument.PrintPage>이벤트.</xref:System.Drawing.Printing.PrintDocument.PrintPage> </xref:System.Drawing.Printing.PrintDocument>

trans-unit.source: <xref:System.Drawing.Printing.PrintController.OnStartPrint%2A> creates the <xref:System.Drawing.Graphics> that is sent to the printer.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Drawing.Printing.PrintController.OnStartPrint%2A>만듭니다는 <xref:System.Drawing.Graphics>프린터에 보내집니다.</xref:System.Drawing.Graphics></xref:System.Drawing.Printing.PrintController.OnStartPrint%2A>

trans-unit.source: After <xref:System.Drawing.Printing.PrintController.OnStartPrint%2A> is called, the OnStartPage method sets the <xref:System.Drawing.Graphics> to a graphic of a single page.
trans-unit.target: 후 <xref:System.Drawing.Printing.PrintController.OnStartPrint%2A>호출 OnStartPage 메서드 집합은 <xref:System.Drawing.Graphics>단일 페이지의 그래픽으로.</xref:System.Drawing.Graphics> </xref:System.Drawing.Printing.PrintController.OnStartPrint%2A>

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Drawing.Printing.PrintController.OnEndPage%2A> method clears the <xref:System.Drawing.Graphics>, while the <xref:System.Drawing.Printing.PrintController.OnEndPrint%2A> method deallocates the object.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Drawing.Printing.PrintController.OnEndPage%2A>메서드 지웁니다는 <xref:System.Drawing.Graphics>, 동안는 <xref:System.Drawing.Printing.PrintController.OnEndPrint%2A>메서드 개체 할당을 취소 합니다.</xref:System.Drawing.Printing.PrintController.OnEndPrint%2A> </xref:System.Drawing.Graphics> </xref:System.Drawing.Printing.PrintController.OnEndPage%2A>

trans-unit.source: Use the OnStartPage method to set how to print a page in a document.
trans-unit.target: OnStartPage 메서드에 사용 하 여 문서에서 페이지를 인쇄 하는 방법을 설정 합니다.

trans-unit.source: For example, you can adjust page settings separately for each page.
trans-unit.target: 예를 들어, 각 페이지 별로 페이지 설정을 조정할 수 있습니다.

trans-unit.source: A <xref href="System.Drawing.Printing.PrintDocument"></xref> that represents the document currently being printed.
trans-unit.target: A <xref href="System.Drawing.Printing.PrintDocument"> </xref> 현재 인쇄 중인 문서를 나타내는입니다.

trans-unit.source: A <xref href="System.Drawing.Printing.PrintPageEventArgs"></xref> that contains the event data.
trans-unit.target: A <xref href="System.Drawing.Printing.PrintPageEventArgs"> </xref> 하는 이벤트 데이터를 포함 합니다.

trans-unit.source: A <xref href="System.Drawing.Graphics"></xref> that represents a page from a <xref href="System.Drawing.Printing.PrintDocument"></xref>.
trans-unit.target: A <xref href="System.Drawing.Graphics"> </xref> 에서 페이지를 나타내는 <xref href="System.Drawing.Printing.PrintDocument"> </xref>합니다.

trans-unit.source: When overridden in a derived class, begins the control sequence that determines when and how to print a document.
trans-unit.target: 파생된 클래스에서 재정의 되 면 시기 및 문서를 인쇄 하는 방법을 결정 하는 컨트롤 시퀀스를 시작 합니다.

trans-unit.source: OnStartPrint is called immediately after the <xref:System.Drawing.Printing.PrintDocument> raises the <xref:System.Drawing.Printing.PrintDocument.BeginPrint> event.
trans-unit.target: OnStartPrint 직후에 호출 되는 <xref:System.Drawing.Printing.PrintDocument>발생는 <xref:System.Drawing.Printing.PrintDocument.BeginPrint>이벤트.</xref:System.Drawing.Printing.PrintDocument.BeginPrint> </xref:System.Drawing.Printing.PrintDocument>

trans-unit.source: Use the OnStartPrint method to determine when and how to print a document.
trans-unit.target: OnStartPrint 메서드를 사용 하 여 시기와 문서를 인쇄 하는 방법을 결정 합니다.

trans-unit.source: For example, you can delay printing for 30 minutes or adjust the printer settings for the document.
trans-unit.target: 예를 들어 30 분에 대 한 인쇄를 지연 하거나 문서에 대 한 프린터 설정을 조정할 수 있습니다.

trans-unit.source: OnStartPrint creates the <xref:System.Drawing.Graphics> that is sent to the printer.
trans-unit.target: OnStartPrint 만듭니다는 <xref:System.Drawing.Graphics>프린터에 보내집니다.</xref:System.Drawing.Graphics>

trans-unit.source: After OnStartPrint is called, the <xref:System.Drawing.Printing.PrintController.OnStartPage%2A> method sets the <xref:System.Drawing.Graphics> to one of a single page.
trans-unit.target: OnStartPrint 호출 되 면는 <xref:System.Drawing.Printing.PrintController.OnStartPage%2A>메서드 집합은 <xref:System.Drawing.Graphics>단일 페이지 중 하나로.</xref:System.Drawing.Graphics> </xref:System.Drawing.Printing.PrintController.OnStartPage%2A>

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Drawing.Printing.PrintController.OnEndPage%2A> method clears the <xref:System.Drawing.Graphics>, while the <xref:System.Drawing.Printing.PrintController.OnEndPrint%2A> method deallocates the object.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Drawing.Printing.PrintController.OnEndPage%2A>메서드 지웁니다는 <xref:System.Drawing.Graphics>, 동안는 <xref:System.Drawing.Printing.PrintController.OnEndPrint%2A>메서드 개체 할당을 취소 합니다.</xref:System.Drawing.Printing.PrintController.OnEndPrint%2A> </xref:System.Drawing.Graphics> </xref:System.Drawing.Printing.PrintController.OnEndPage%2A>

trans-unit.source: The OnStartPrint method is a good place to verify that <xref:System.Drawing.Printing.PrinterSettings> are valid.
trans-unit.target: OnStartPrint 방법은 되어 있는지 확인 하는 데 <xref:System.Drawing.Printing.PrinterSettings>유효 합니다.</xref:System.Drawing.Printing.PrinterSettings>

trans-unit.source: A <xref href="System.Drawing.Printing.PrintDocument"></xref> that represents the document currently being printed.
trans-unit.target: A <xref href="System.Drawing.Printing.PrintDocument"> </xref> 현재 인쇄 중인 문서를 나타내는입니다.

trans-unit.source: A <xref href="System.Drawing.Printing.PrintEventArgs"></xref> that contains the event data.
trans-unit.target: A <xref href="System.Drawing.Printing.PrintEventArgs"> </xref> 하는 이벤트 데이터를 포함 합니다.
